mapper.select: select*from (select m.member_name , m.member_email , m.member_no, t.team_no , t.member_position , todo.todo_list_content, todo.todo_list_no, topi.topic_name,topi.topic_no from member m inner join team_member t on m.member_no = t.member_no inner join todo_list todo on t.member_no = todo.member_no inner join topic topi on todo.topic_no = topi.topic_no) where team_no=#{team_no} and member_no=#{member_no} order by todo_list_content
mapper.delete: delete from todo_list where member_no=#{member_no} and todo_list_no=#{todo_list_no}
